title: System media library
content:
I have recently purchased the JetAudio Plus app as a music player. Unfortunately the player dows not load or play all the music files that are on my device. In fact the app recognises only 2...I have contacted them about it and they insist that:

"It sound like your android system media scanner issue.
As you may know jetaudio use Android system media library.
So, if your system does not has correct information, jetAudio cannot show/playback for you.
I guess, somehow your system media scanner does not work, right after copy that file into your device."

Could this be the case and how can I correct my system media scanner? They have not offered any more guidance and advised me to contact you about it.

Thanks
